mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTN_BATCH_SCHDUL A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_BATCH_OPERT B ON A.BATCH_OPERT_ID = B.BATCH_OPERT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM047') C ON A.EXECUT_CYCLE = C.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND B.BATCH_OPERT_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND B.BATCH_PROGRM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID , A.BATCH_OPERT_ID , A.START_DELAY , A.REPEAT_INTERVAL , A.EXECUT_CYCLE , C.CODE_NM AS "executCycleNm" , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND , B.BATCH_OPERT_NM , B.BATCH_PROGRM , B.PARAMTR , B.BATCH_OBJECT , B.BATCH_METHOD , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS "lastUpdusrPnttm" , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" FROM COMTN_BATCH_SCHDUL A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_BATCH_OPERT B ON A.BATCH_OPERT_ID = B.BATCH_OPERT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM047') C ON A.EXECUT_CYCLE = C.CODE WHERE A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID = #{batchSchdulId}

SELECT A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE , B.CODE_NM AS "executSchdulDfkSeNm" FROM COMTN_BATCH_SCHDUL_DFK A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM074') B ON A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE = B.CODE WHERE A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID = #{batchSchdulId}
